encyclopedia.content: 简介歌曲简介 歌曲名称：Libra 发行时间： 2010.07.27 发行厂牌 : Self-Released 专辑风格 : Indie Rock / Indie Pop 专辑：Just Say Yes 歌手：The Narrative歌手简介 来自纽约的四人独立流行摇滚乐队The Narrative暖色调，简简单单的温暖。.耳朵可以不用思考了，就这么循环着播放。聆听暖色调的温暖声音，带着点点雀跃。 2009年10月份成立，2010年7月份发行EP《Just Say Yes》，应该说是非常成功的一张EP。整张EP6首曲子首首朗

entry.tran: 天秤宫，天秤座（黄道十二宫之一。出生于9月23日至10月22日之间的人属此星座）
entry.def: Libra is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a pair of scales. People who are born approximately between the 23rd of September and the 22nd of October come under this sign.

entry.tran: 出生于天秤宫时段的人
entry.def: A Libra is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Libra.

means.word_mean: 1. (astrology) a person who is born while the sun in in Libra
2. a small faint zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Virgo and Scorpius
3. the seventh sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about September 23 to October 22
